channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Pallet uses AI to bring logistics into the 21st century
item.description: Transportation and warehousing are multi-trillion-dollar industries, but the technologies that power them are often outdated, inefficient and siloed. ...

item.title: News agency AFP notifies French authorities of potential data breach
item.description: The Paris-based news giant said it notified French regulators of a potential data breach following a recent cyberattack. © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights...

item.title: Starling Bank fined $39 million for ‘facilitating financial crime’
item.description: Starling Bank, a popular challenger bank based in the U.K., has received a £29 million fine from the country’s financial regulator (around $39 million...

item.title: Coperni’s Spray-On Dress Was a Viral Smash. This Gravity-Defying Gel Bag Might Top It
item.description: The sci-fi-loving fashion house has partnered with Disney to make an eco-friendly bag that could signal a shift in 3D-printed apparel.

item.title: 5 Best Food Dehydrators, Tested and Reviewed
item.description: We put some of the most popular food dehydrators to the test with beef jerky, fruit leather, and dried flowers.

item.title: Bobbi Althoff on Exactly How She Got Rich—and How Rich, Exactly
item.description: From Mommy TikTok to that Drake interview and beyond, the podcast host is proof you can brute-force your way to online fame—and make a shit ton of mon...

item.title: How to Generate an AI Podcast Using Google’s NotebookLM
item.description: A little-known AI notebook tool from Google is going viral for its Audio Overviews that mimic the speech cadence of podcasters. Here’s how to try it o...

item.title: Instant harkens back to a pre-Google Firebase
item.description: Instant wants to recapture some of the magic of the pre-Google-acquisition Firebase by building a modern, Postgres-based open source version of it. Li...

item.title: Gmail’s new ‘summary cards’ help you take action on your emails, like tracking packages and checking into flights
item.description: Competition in the email market is heating up. After Apple’s iOS 18 introduced a slew of Gmail-like features to Apple’s Mail app, including categoriza...

item.title: No, Tim Walz Is Not Friends with School Shooters
